page.title: 10Improving Peterlee.
page.content: {Peterlee}could be improved by having larger normal playgrounds,an adventure playground and an outdoor swimming pool.{The Leisure Centre}could be improved by putting in a big water slide so it would be more fun,because it costs 45p to go swimming,which is a bit expensive. The town could also do with a{cinema. Houses with{flat roofs}could be improved by having pointed roofs put on to stop roofs from leaking any more.{Condensation problems}could be cured if the council put double glazing into houses and repaired damp walls. {Peterlee}is clean in most places,but it could be made more atractive by planting more flower_beds and by people putting litter into bins or taking it home with them.
